L1.competency: Scope Management (Project Manager) - When rating this competency, the following attributes should be considered, but not limited to, when thinking of what it takes to be a Project Manager;  A) Lead a project team through project scope definition, resource allocation, and release planning. B) Create and maintain scope statement documentation. C) Manage changes to the scope statement; including stakeholder communication and impact assessment. D) Guide project to completion through careful management of project scope. E) Identify out of scope items and address them appropriately.

examples.0: Limited experience or knowledge. May have some familiarity but no hands-on or professional experience.
examples.1: Has some experience or knowledge. Can perform with limited oversight and guidance.
examples.2: Has production-level experience and deep hands-on knowledge. Can effectively share knowledge and assist others.
examples.3: Expert-level. Fully autonomous and can deliver consistently with an exceptional degree of quality.

L2.competency: Scope Management (Sr. Project Manager) - When rating this competency, the following attributes should be considered, but not limited to, when thinking of what it takes to be a Sr. Project Manager; A) Lead multiple project teams through project scope definition / release planning. B) Participate in scope definition of complex projects with ambiguous requirements and timelines. C) Act as scope subject matter expert and provide scope best practices based on the changing needs of the organization. D) Support and mentor Project Managers in scope definition and documentation best practices

examples.0: Limited experience or knowledge. May have some familiarity but no hands-on or professional experience.
examples.1: Has some experience or knowledge. Can perform with limited oversight and guidance.
examples.2: Has production-level experience and deep hands-on knowledge. Can effectively share knowledge and assist others.
examples.3: Expert-level. Fully autonomous and can deliver consistently with an exceptional degree of quality.
